info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 15 at 5:35AM AST until May 15 at 7:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Naguabo.
* WHEN...Until 700 AM AST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. River or stream flows are elevated.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 531 AM AST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.8 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. River sensors also indicate that Rio Blanco is at minor flood stage. Emergency Managers have already been informed and are on their way to verify. A Flood Warning will possibly be issued if this trend continues. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naguabo, Aguas Claras, Roosevelt Roads, Duque, Rio Blanco, Pena Pobre and Daguao. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AST THIS MORNING
